text: Mountbatten MRT is in a suburban area. Convenient buses on both old airport road and Mountbatten road.  Some that can take you down Mountbatten, fort road and to Tanjong rhu. Nice park just beside. Walking distance to Mountbatten square businesses.
Nice, clean, spacious and not too busy MRT station. Walking distance to Old Airport Food Centre

Mountbatten MRT Train Disruption. Dobt seems to see any guide or personnel guiding people to take free bus or provide proper directions.

Rushing time made us even frustrated ðŸ˜  ðŸ˜¡
